compliant.section: 簡介 – 本公司不會主動蒐集或處理特種個人資料。
compliant.legal provisions: The principle of data minimization and purpose limitation.

compliant.section: 如果基於合法的理由而需處理特種個人資料，我們將遵循相關法律規定。
compliant.legal provisions: Processing of special categories of personal data is permitted under specific conditions.

non_compliant.section: 本公司不會主動蒐集或處理特種個人資料。
non_compliant.amend: Include a statement on how individuals can access their rights regarding special categories of personal data.
